statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -6 \\ -5 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -6 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ 24 \\ 33 \\ 15 \\ 36 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -6 \\ -5 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -6 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ 24 \\ 33 \\ 15 \\ 36 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
